TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Target extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a single [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element in an [!INCLUDE[vstecmsbuild](~/add/includes/vstecmsbuild-md.md)] project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask AddNewTask(string taskName) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that represents the element to add to the element.
Docs.summary: Adds the specified [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element to the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
Docs.returns: A object represents a child `Task` element of the `Target` element.

Docs.summary: Gets the `Condition` attribute value of the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
Docs.value: The `Condition` attribute value of the `Target` element.

Docs.summary: Gets the `DependsOnTargets` attribute value of the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element, which is a semicolon-separated list.
Docs.value: The `DependsOnTargets` attribute value of the `Target` element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the objects in the .
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the objects in the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target>.
A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> object represents a child element of the `Target` element.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the items that are to be input into this target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Items inside this target attribute are used as the inputs in the top level dependency analysis.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element was imported into the project.
Docs.value: if the `Target` element was imported into the project; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the `Name` attribute value of the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.
Docs.value: The `Name` attribute value of the `Target` element.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the expected outputs of this target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can apply transforms to this target attribute to transform a set of input items into a set of output items. This attribute is used not only for top level dependency analysis but also for the purposes of defining this targets outputs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveTask(class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask taskElement) cil managed

Docs.param: The object that represents the element to remove from the element.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified [Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element from the [Target](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildTask> object represents a child `Task` element of the `Target` element.
